metadata.title: CVE-2024-32152 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: A blocklist bypass vulnerability exists in the LaTeX functionality ofAnkitects Anki 24.04. A specially crafted malicious flashcard can lead toan arbitrary file creation at a fixed path. An attacker can share amalicious flashcard to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: anki package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
